content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
- Wooden Chests at various positions for storing coal and iron plates

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
- Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions(x=2.5, y=0.5) and (x=0.5, y=2.5) for storing science packs
- Electricity Group with id 3199 connecting the lab to the power network

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it
- Make sure the entity has enough space to hold the item being inserted
- Check if the item exists in the agent's inventory before attempting to insert it

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure the lab has enough science packs to research the technology
- Make sure the lab is connected to the power network and has enough power to research the technology

### Errors when using unknown prototypes
- Ensure the prototype exists and is valid before attempting to use it
- Check the prototype's name and parameters to ensure they are correct

### Errors when connecting entities to the power network
- Ensure the entity can be connected to the power network before attempting to connect it
- Make sure the power network has enough voltage to power the entity
- Check if the entity is already connected to the power network before attempting to connect it again
